name: Barbie and the Three Musketeers
description:
In this platformer based on the DVD movie of the same name, Barbie plays Corinne who want to be Musketeers in the French countryside. You play as Corinne and several of her friends: Aramina, Renee and Viveca who each have different abilities that will help you get through different parts of your missions. Use teamwork and their friendship to help solve puzzles and bypass obstacles. You uncover a plot against the prince and must avert it from completing.

Journey through a dozen different locations from the movie all the way to Paris. Use different items such as grapples, ribbon whips, and Chinese fans as you leap and dance through game areas. Find treasure along the way. The girl's pet companion Miette the Cat can also be controlled to get into areas that the girls can't.
